languages.text: "Я уверена, что судно для столь важной персоны, как Лорд-капитан, дожидается нас на положенном месте. Разве чернь не должна знать свое место в очереди на спасение?"
"For a person as important as the Lord Captain, I am certain there will be a vessel waiting where it should be. Surely the commoners know their place in the evacuation order?"
languages.original_text: "Я уверена, что судно для столь важной персоны, как Лорд-капитан, дожидается нас на положенном месте. Разве чернь не должна знать свое место в очереди на спасение?"

traits.locale_text: "For a person as important as the Lord Captain, I am certain there will be a vessel waiting where it should be. Surely the commoners know their place in the evacuation order?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "For a person as important as the Lord Captain, I am certain there will be a vessel waiting where it should be. Surely the commoners know their place in the evacuation order?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "For a person as important as the Lord Captain, I am certain there will be a vessel waiting where it should be. Surely the commoners know their place in the evacuation order?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "For a person as important as the Lord Captain, I am certain there will be a vessel waiting where it should be. Surely the commoners know their place in the evacuation order?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “对于舰长大人这种重要人物而言，我敢肯定，会有一艘穿梭机在它该在的地方等待着。平民们应该很清楚他们疏散的优先级吧？”
languages.original_text: "For a person as important as the Lord Captain, I am certain there will be a vessel waiting where it should be. Surely the commoners know their place in the evacuation order?"

traits.locale_text: “对于舰长大人这种重要人物而言，我敢肯定，会有一艘穿梭机在它该在的地方等待着。平民们应该很清楚他们疏散的优先级吧？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Para una persona tan importante como nuestr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán habrá una lanzadera esperando en el lugar adecuado. No me cabe duda de que los plebeyos estarán al corriente de su puesto en el orden de evacuación».
languages.original_text: "For a person as important as the Lord Captain, I am certain there will be a vessel waiting where it should be. Surely the commoners know their place in the evacuation order?"

traits.locale_text: «Para una persona tan importante como nuestr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán habrá una lanzadera esperando en el lugar adecuado. No me cabe duda de que los plebeyos estarán al corriente de su puesto en el orden de evacuación».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンのような重要人物のためならば、きっと船舶はあるべき場所で待っていることでしょう。避難命令が勧告された今、平民たちは身分をわきまえることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "For a person as important as the Lord Captain, I am certain there will be a vessel waiting where it should be. Surely the commoners know their place in the evacuation order?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンのような重要人物のためならば、きっと船舶はあるべき場所で待っていることでしょう。避難命令を受けた一般人なら、その場所を知っているのでは？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Auf eine Person von der Bedeutung des Lord Captains wird gewiss ein Schiff warten, wo es warten sollte. Die Bürger kennen doch sicher ihren Platz in der Evakuierungsreihenfolge?"
languages.original_text: "For a person as important as the Lord Captain, I am certain there will be a vessel waiting where it should be. Surely the commoners know their place in the evacuation order?"

traits.locale_text: "Auf eine Person von der Bedeutung des Lord Captains wird gewiss ein Schiff warten, wo es warten sollte. Die Bürger kennen doch sicher ihren Platz in der Evakuierungsreihenfolge?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis sûre qu'un vaisseau attend {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} à sa place. {mf|Il|Elle} est bien trop {mf|important|importante}. Les petites gens doivent bien respecter l'ordre hiérarchique d'évacuation, non ? »
languages.original_text: "For a person as important as the Lord Captain, I am certain there will be a vessel waiting where it should be. Surely the commoners know their place in the evacuation order?"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis sûre qu'un vaisseau attend {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} à sa place. {mf|Il|Elle} est bien trop {mf|important|importante}. Les petites gens doivent bien respecter l'ordre hiérarchique d'évacuation, non ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan kadar önemli bir şahsiyet için eminim ki orada bir yerde bir araç bekliyordur. Halk muhakkak tahliye sırasında önceliğin onda olduğunu biliyordur."
languages.original_text: "For a person as important as the Lord Captain, I am certain there will be a vessel waiting where it should be. Surely the commoners know their place in the evacuation order?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan kadar önemli bir kişi için eminim beklemesi gereken yerde bekleyen bir araç vardır. Halk, tahliye sırasında yerini biliyordur muhakkak?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "For a person as important as the Lord Captain, I am certain there will be a vessel waiting where it should be. Surely the commoners know their place in the evacuation order?"
